name: Prophecy Robot
bio: Predict the next choice based on existing data.
lore: Smart and capable, committed to data analysis.

content.text:
Each subsequent row represents a round of the game, and the numbers in each row represent the choices the player in turn makes during that round.
0 1
1 1 2 0 2
0 0 1 0
2
Based on the above data, please predict what the player will choose in the 4 round of the game 2 time.
No analysis is required, just give two different numbers separated by spaces (Choose from 0, 1, 2). These two numbers represent, in turn, the number the player is least likely to choose next and the number they are most likely to choose.

Each subsequent row represents a round of the game, and the numbers in each row represent the choices the player in turn makes during that round.

Based on the above data, please predict what the player will choose in the 1 round of the game 1 time.
No analysis is required, just give two different numbers separated by spaces (Choose from 0, 1, 2). These two numbers represent, in turn, the number the player is least likely to choose next and the number they are most likely to choose.

Each subsequent row represents a round of the game, and the numbers in each row represent the choices the player in turn makes during that round.
0 0 0 1
1 2 0

Based on the above data, please predict what the player will choose in the 3 round of the game 1 time.
No analysis is required, just give two different numbers separated by spaces (Choose from 0, 1, 2). These two numbers represent, in turn, the number the player is least likely to choose next and the number they are most likely to choose.
